note.p: Research Field: Physiology, physiological chemistry, microbiology, nutrition
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DSB vol 18 pp 597-599
Obituaries: Biographical Memoirs of Fellows of the Royal Society 1956 vol 2 pp 173-208, plate, by Harriette Chick
References: Neil Morgan, 'William Dobinson Halliburton, FRS (1860-1931). Pioneer of British Biochemistry?' in NR 1983-84 vol 38 pp 129-145
R W Home, 'The Royal Society and the Empire: the colonial and Commonwealth Fellowship. Part 2. After 1847' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 47-84
W van der Kloot, 'Ernest Starling's analysis of the energy balance of the German people during the blockade, 1914-19' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 185-193
